sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import './checkout.styles.scss' import { CartContext } from '../../providers/cart/cart.provider' const CheckOutPage = ({ total }) => { const { cartItems } = useContext(CartContext) return(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map( item => ( ))}
TOTAL: ${total}
*Please use the following test credit card for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 01/22 - CVV: 123
)} const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector( { total: selectCartTotal } ) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckOutPage)
